content:
After fielding lots of questions and seeing lots of confusions about all the different versions of the IG running around, I drafted the following guidance. I welcome feedback, and hope it helps.

https://confluence.hl7.org/display/CGW/Understanding+versions+of+the+Genomics+Reporting+IG

Kevin Power said:

After fielding lots of questions and seeing lots of confusions about all the different versions of the IG running around, I drafted the following guidance. I welcome feedback, and hope it helps.

https://confluence.hl7.org/display/CGW/Understanding+versions+of+the+Genomics+Reporting+IG

Thank you Kevin! This is a very valuable document you created! I really appreciate your taking the time to do this. It helps me personally keep track of what is published where - but more importantly, we can link people to it, when they are trying to navigate various versions of our IG.

@Kevin Power Thanks for the guide regarding the IG versions! I did post a topic but thought it wasn't the right place to ask so I marked it solved (couldn't find the delete function).
your guide should help clear confusions on the versions and help implementors to look at the correct version! :+1:
